Posts.Content: Dec 18, 2007 02:16AM - edited Dec 18, 2007 02:36AM by Sofie Mom's taste buds has gone bonkers as well, she had her 2nd AC last Wed. Have to agree that this loss of taste beats losing hair big time. She would find one thing edible then another 2 or 3 occassions later, she would hate it. We are now at the point where she doesn't find anything appealing to eat, she's lost her desire to eat. I'm at a loss trying to get food into her, especially protein. She's gotten depressed and wants to give up chemo. We have 2 AC treatments left. Help... Counting the days, Sofie
Posts.Title: I want my taste back! Help! StillKicking Sofie
